means: 已冷的，冷硬了的，冷冻的
（使）变冷( chill的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Nervously clutching our glasses of chilled wine, we gathered on the terrace.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们聚集在露台上,手里紧张地握着盛有冰镇葡萄酒的酒杯.

sentence.Network_en: There was a coldness in her that chilled him.
sentence.Network_cn: 她身上透着一股冷漠，让他不寒而栗。

sentence.Network_en: The very thought of it chilled me to the marrow.
sentence.Network_cn: 一想到这个我就不寒而栗。

entry.def: When you chill something or when it chills, you lower its temperature so that it becomes colder but does not freeze.

example.ex: Chill the fruit salad until serving time...
example.tran: 把水果色拉冰镇一下，吃的时候再拿出来。

example.ex: These doughs can be rolled out while you wait for the pastry to chill.
example.tran: 在等油酥糕饼凉的时候，可以把这些面团擀薄些。

entry.def: When cold weather or something cold chills a person or a place, it makes that person or that place feel very cold.

example.ex: The marble floor was beginning to chill me...
example.tran: 大理石地面开始让我觉得发冷。

example.ex: An exposed garden may be chilled by cold winds...
example.tran: 露天花园容易被冷风吹透。

entry.def: If you say that something you see, hear, or feel chills you, you mean that it frightens you.

example.ex: There was a coldness in her that chilled him...
example.tran: 她身上透着一股冷漠，让他不寒而栗。

example.ex: Some films chill you to the marrow of your bones.
example.tran: 有些电影让人毛骨悚然。

entry.def: If something sends a chill through you, it gives you a sudden feeling of fear or anxiety.

example.ex: The violence used against the students sent a chill through Indonesia...
example.tran: 针对学生的暴力使得整个印度尼西亚不寒而栗。

example.ex: He smiled, an odd, dreamy smile that sent chills up my back.
example.tran: 他笑了，笑容古怪迷离，叫我后背发凉。

entry.def: A chill is a mild illness which can give you a slight fever and headache.

example.ex: He caught a chill while performing at a rain-soaked open-air venue.
example.tran: 他在大雨瓢泼的露天场地演出时受了寒。

entry.def: Chill weather is cold and unpleasant.

example.tran: 凄风、冷雨和波浪起伏的大海

auth_sentence.content: Just beneath a chilled-out Californian friendliness is steely control.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just beneath a chilled-out Californian friendliness is steely control.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just beneath a chilled-out Californian friendliness is steely control.
